RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COME WHAT MAE settled early along the inside, moved closer while still saving ground to be closest to the leader through the second turn, moved out, bid nearing the furlong grounds, wore down that rival under firm handling to prove best. RIPTIDE ROSE broke on top, clear past the wire the first time, rated through some moderate fractions, continued to hold a daylight advantage into the lane, responded when the winner challenged a furlong out, gave ground grudgingly to that rival while holding sway for the place. TOLATETOOWAIT moved up to race in the second fight, dropped inside, saved ground second turn, closed the gap on the top two late. GEAUX VOTE lacked early foot while inside, continued to race the rail into the far turn, came three wide for the drive, steered out wider around some traffic kn midstretch and improved position. CAT B CAUSE chased the runner up for five furlongs, gradually weakened. STAR FASHION broke back, continued devoid of speed, improved position slightly without posing a serious threat. AUNT JANA last away, moved up to race in midpack, lacked a closing response through the lane. LUCKY HARBORAGE was finished early. OVERLY SWEET fell back to trail after the start, was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Star Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Overly Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Come What Mae
ENTRY.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Mullican Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early inside, closer 2nd turn, outside bid,wore down foe

ENTRY.NAME: Geaux Vote
ENTRY.OWNER: The Peach Pit LLC and Abbott Barbara
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed inside, steered 3w into lane, moved wider,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Riptide Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared, moderate pace, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Harborage
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Cat B Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Jana
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, moved up to midpack, no response drive

ENTRY.NAME: Tolatetoowait
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, moved inside, closed gap late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRIEND'S DO CARE with pace from the start while between foes early, continued to vie while closest to the inside turn, shook, clear turning for home, extended that advantage past the furlong marker then coasted home unthreatened. IRON N STEEL forwardly placed early inside, in tight, shuffled and steadied to fall back before a quarter, three wide into the lane, rallied to be well clear for the place, failed to threaten the winner. ALL COUNTRY with the early pace inside, fell back before a quarter, evenly through the turn, along for the show late while not a threat to the top two. WINE MY PRIORITY set or forced the pace for over three furlongs while widest of the first flight then weakened when the real running began at the head of the lane. HALF CRAZY went one paced throughout in lacking a closing kick. ALWAYS LEAVING bumped at the start, was used to move up and contest the pace between horses for three furlongs and began to weaken. POP POP MIKE broke out, bumped, off slowly, trailed throughout and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Iron N Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early inside, steadied,shuffled 5/8,rallied 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Half Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: All Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, fell back, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Friend's Do Care
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start, vied inside turn, shook clear, coasted

ENTRY.NAME: Pop Pop Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bump,off slowly, trailed, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Always Leaving
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump brk, used, vied btwn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Wine My Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: helped set pace outside,weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEASE ME NOT off a step slow, split foes when advancing turning for home, continued rally three wide, going away at the end. JUMPIN JUDY broke on top, dueled up front off the inside, disposed of the other speed to be clear past the furlong marker, offered little resistance to the winner late while drifing out to prove no match, all out to preserve the place. HIDDEN LOVE away in good order, dueled up front for a half inside, fell back off the runner up midstretch then was coming back on that one late for the second spot. SASSY SPRY in the second flight while racing toward the inside, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing punch. BANK ON IT in the second group while outside, came four wide and outside the winner exiting the turn, had little left for the run to the wire. DAT DARES RIGHT well off the pace while saving ground through the turn, lacked a closing response. EXPECT A DANCER remained back in failing to menace. ABBY DABBY trailed to be always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, fell back, coming back 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Abby Dabby
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpin Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 2p, shook clear, drifted out, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Tease Me Not
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, split foes into lane, 3w rally, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Spry
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Bank On It
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w into lane, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Dat Dares Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: well off the pace inside, lacked a closing response

ENTRY.NAME: Expect a Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUMMER LIGHTNING broke on top, pressed the issue up the backstretch off the inside, took over turn, carried ZYDECO MUSIC out to the five path turning for home, refused to yield to that one through the lane, enough left in the final strides to withstand the runner up. MY FRIEND AMY broke back, void of speed, continued to lag turn just off the inside, split foes nearing the furlong marker when beginning to rally, finished best of all to miss while on the outside of the first flight at the wire. ZYDECO MUSIC last away,moved closer into the turn, continued to advance and challenged outside the winner by late in the bend, floated out by that one into the five path into the lane, raced on equal terms with that one past the furlong marker, outkicked by that one late while being nipped for the second spot at the wire between the top two. SWEET VIDALIA back off the pace while outside, also was five wide out of the turn, lacked a serious closing response while improving position slightly. ROSE PALACE in the second group while racing toward the inside, asked along midway on the turn, failed to muster a rally. FIRED UP TIGER back off the pace and the inside, also lacked a response through the lane. BROKE FINANCING narrowly set the early pace inside, gave way late in the turn. JERSEY HOTTIE fell back to trail after the start and was not a factor. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF ZYDECO MUSIC AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE EXITING THE TURN, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Hottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Broke Financing
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, gave way late turn

ENTRY.NAME: Zydeco Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, closer into turn, floated 5w into lane, bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group toward inside, asked along mid turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Lightning
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pressed, took over turn, carried foe out 1/4,dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Fired Up Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Vidalia
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace outside, 5w into the lane, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: My Friend Amy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lagged turn, split foes, rallied, coming late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OVERTAXED outrun in the early going outside, began to move early in the turn, came five wide into the stretch when rallying, challenged a furlong out and drove strongly clear. THE FIVE B'S chased the early leader off the inside, continued to pursue into the lane, proved no match for the winner late while overtaking the pacesetter for the runner up spot. KAHAAL cleared early, set a lively pace toward the inside, continued to hold the advantage into the stretch, weakened. ONE TOUGH CHARLIE within striking distance off the inside, came three wide into the lane, came up empty for the drive to the wire. BRYKEN N MITCHELL crowded back at the start, trailed early, improved position off the inside without posing a serious threat. BYATHREAD in mid pack up the backstretch inside, shuffled back a bit while continuing along the inside through the turn, also bettered himself through the lane while non threatening. RUSH THE COLORS back off the early pace, moved a bit closer off the inside early in the turn then flattened out. CLASSIC RED RACER in tight at the start, failed to menace. VEGAS GUY remained always back. FUNNY ACTOR in the second flight early, began a steady retreat before three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back

ENTRY.NAME: Byathread
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, shuffled back turn, improved stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Kahaal
ENTRY.COMMENT: cleared early, lively pace, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Red Racer
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight start, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Bryken N Mitchell
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded back start, improved position off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Overtaxed
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, began to move far turn, 5w into lane, bid,strongly

ENTRY.NAME: Rush the Colors
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit closer off rail early turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: The Five B's
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader, collared that one, no match winner

ENTRY.NAME: One Tough Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, 3w into lane, empty late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 21, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Clai ming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APRIL MIST off the early pace well out in the course, came four wide and between foes into the straight, long drive to the wire, proved best while once again between rivals at the wire. HOW BOUT ME broke back, lacked speed for three furlongs off the inside, rallied through traffic and was also determined late to gain the nod for the place. MARIAH'S CANDY in mid pack while widest outside the winner, came with that one into the stretch in the five path, unable to match that same rival late, narrowly missed the place. FIRINGTOTHEFRONT dueled early along the inside through some lively fractions,shook clear a furlong out, ,caved in late. ZERO POINT ZERO broke forwardly, shuffled back a bit the opening furlong, chased the leader upper stretch, came up empty late. RUMPUS pressured the leader from the two path for three furlongs and began to weaken. DOWNTOWN ABBY remained back in lacking a rally. GYPSYROSELEE steadied soon after the start in some traffic, faded down the stretch. RAISE THE PRAISE last away, trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Firingtothefront
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace inside, clear, caved in late

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsyroselee
ENTRY.OWNER: Westmark Richard N and Westmark Mary S
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early in traffic, mid pack, faded

ENTRY.NAME: How Bout Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, rallied thru traffic,nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Downtown Abby
ENTRY.OWNER: Gorsky Bob Eaton John and Sayeg Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in lacking a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Point Zero
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke forwardly, shuffled bit early, chased, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Rumpus
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed lively pace 2p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: April Mist
ENTRY.OWNER: Stewart, Chad J. and Lenci, Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace off rail, 4w and btwn foes into lane, determined

ENTRY.NAME: Mariah's Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack while widest, 5p into lane, rallied outside,missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Raise the Praise
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 21, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 21, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 21, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUFFIN NUTS prompted the soft pace from the two path, engaged the leader and dueled into the far turn, shook clear when straightened for home, maintained a daylight advantage to the wire under steady handling. CHEROKEE TAKEOVER settled off the pace and the inside, moved closer from between horses second turn, three wide into the lane, slowly getting to the winner late. PAYDAY TOO void of speed behind the soft pace, continued to late second turn,split foes when beginning to advance in upper stretch and finished a mild rally to annex the show. HELLUVA LIFE void of speed, five wide into the stretch when improving a bit, flattened out the final furlong. CORVETTE SPIRIT broke on top, hustled clear into the first turn, set a soft pace along the rail, dueled far turn inside the winner, backed up through the stretch. IBERVILLE last to leave, raced back off the pace and off the inside, four wide into the stretch, failed to muster a rally. OUTLAW X. forwardly placed for six furlongs in the three path, gave way. HONOR MY SPEED had nothing for the drive. PER RULING DATED09/28/2023 RECEIVED FROM THE LOUISIANA STATE RACING COMMISSION (RULING #25080), MUFFIN NUTS WAS DQ'D FOR A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Corvette Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, hustled clear, mild pace, gave way stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Honor My Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: had nothing for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Helluva Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w into lane, improved, flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Payday Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, split foes upper, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Takeover
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closer between foes turning for home, slow gain

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & J. Adcock

ENTRY.NAME: Iberville
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back off pace, four wide into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Muffin Nuts
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted soft pace 2p, dueled, shook clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Outlaw X.
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed for six furlongs, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since May 21, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UP N GONE outrun early off the inside, three wide into the far turn, angled out sharply to be six wide into the lane, put a head in front past the furlong marker, kicked clear under pressure. HOT LE ROY behind the early pace, moved out, four wide bid second turn, vied into the lane and past midstretch inside the winner, could not keep pace late, clear for the place. ALIGNED INTEREST lacked speed outside, four wide through the final bend, rallied mildly to take the show, no real threat to the top two. RANCH WATER pulled early while outside, improved position with some mild late interest off the inside. TSURIS broke back, trailed in lacking any early speed for five furlongs, five wide exiting the final, turn, improved position by passing mostly tiring rivals. THE BOSS SOSS forwardly placed off the inside, advanced and vied between horses second turn, weakened in the drive. BIG BOSS MAN within striking distance, also made a bid while between horses through the second bend, faltered in the drive. ROCK ON COWBOY took over off the inside first turn, set the pace for five furlongs, vied into the far turn closest to the inside, was tiring when in tight and steadied midway on that bend, continued to fade stretch. CHEATIN CHARLIE was finished early and never threatened. OAK HILL SOLUTION asked away from the gate, shuffled back along the inside late in the first turn, stopped after a half, far back, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Le Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind early pace, 4w bid 2nd turn, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cheatin Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Tsuris
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed, 5w into lane, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Oak Hill Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: asked early, shuffled 3/4, stopped, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Up N Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early,off the inside,angled sharply 6w 1/4, bid,kicked clr

ENTRY.NAME: The Boss Soss
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, vied btwn rivals 2nd turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, vied inside, tiring when steadied 5/16

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boss Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 3w bid 2nd turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Aligned Interest
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w 2nd turn, rallied show

ENTRY.NAME: Ranch Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled early outside, improved, mild interest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Turf CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRIPLE RED ACES broke on top, cleared before a furlong, set all the pace, shrugged off a brief bid turning for home, well clear, kept to task. CHECK ME OUT fell back to trail after the start, moved out, four wide, traffic turn, rallied well out in the course and finished willingly to be in time for the place. ARKANSAS ZONG back off the pace and the inside, bothered slightly past the furlong marker when a rival drifted in, quickly recovered, late interest, narrowly missed the place. CURIOUS APRIORITY chased the winner up the backstretch toward the inside, moved a bit closer late in the turn briefly continued to chase past midstretch and weakened. APRIORITY ROCKET forwardly placed early, weakened after three furlongs. BUD WON within striking distance for three furlongs, drifted in past the furlong marker, had little left for the drive. MARVINS' WARRIOR remained back, failed to threaten. C P'S WILD FIRE balked at loading, last to leave, four to five wide turn, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Marvins' Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Check Me Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, traffic midturn, 4w rallied, willing 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bud Won
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, drifted midsretch, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Curious Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader, closer late turn briefly, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Arkansas Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, slight bother 1/8, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Red Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared, shrugged off foe, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: C P's Wild Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: balked loading, last away, 4-5w turn, trailed home
